sn_mcp_ai_skill_tool_definition.description: Create a new version of the Knowledge article using the original article, the readability score, readability description and the suggestions on how to make the knowledge article better. The article needs to be easy to read for Humans and AI, so avoid the use of links. Also make headings clear. Use HTML formatting to make sure the article is easy to read.
